definition: Liberation city district/Jiefang district of Jiaozuo city 焦作市[Jiao1 zuo4 shi4], Henan
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)

sentences.english: The first one probes into intellectual psychology of Sun li in liberated area of period mainly.
sentences.chinese: 第一章主要探討孫犁在解放區時期的知識分子心態。

sentences.english: During the War of Liberation the policy of land reform was carried out in some newly-liberated areas.
sentences.chinese: 在解放戰爭時期，一些新解放區內實行了土改政策。

sentences.english: That is the constant and ever-recurring exhortation to the farm children of the Liberated Areas.
sentences.chinese: 反來複去總是拿生產來激勵解放區的農家孩子。

sentences.english: Sun li was unhonored like a writer of Liberated Area of the great majority afterwards.
sentences.chinese: 隨後他和大多數的解放區作家一樣，寂寂無聞。

sentences.english: ONE of the strangest enterprises I came across in the Liberated Areas was that of banking.
sentences.chinese: 我在解放區看到的一種最奇特的事業就是銀行。

sentences.english: Leaders in the Liberated Areas scoffed at that theory.
sentences.chinese: 解放區的領導人嘲笑了這種理論。

definition: Autumn Harvest Uprising (1927), insurrection in Hunan and Jiangxi provinces led by Mao Zedong
United Front (either of the two alliances between the Guomindang and the Communist Party, 1923-1927 and 1937-1945)
Chen Jiongming (1878-1933), a leading warlord of Guangdong faction, defeated in 1925 and fled to Hong Kong
the Mukden or Manchurian Railway Incident of 18th September 1931 used by the Japanese as a pretext to annex Manchuria/also known as Liutiaogou incident 柳條溝事變|柳条沟事变
Leningrad, name of Russian city Saint Petersburg 聖彼得堡|圣彼得堡 1923-1991
